(spy [spy], female [female])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Consorts are Imperial wives. When the Emperor loses interest in one of his wives, the Lady may be granted more freedom. They are not allowed to lead armies, but their influence in the Imperial Court is undisputed. These Imperial Ladies sometimes serve as diplomats and spies in foreign lands.
